# The `Instruction` Struct Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

## Description {#details}

An instruction consists of a DWARF CFI opcode and an optional sequence of operands.

If it refers to an expression, then this expression has its own sequence of operations and operands handled separately by <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarfexpression">DWARFExpression</a>.

Definition at line 415 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfdebugframe-h">DWARFDebugFrame.h</a>.
